code: import{CartActionTypes}from'./cart.types.js';export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeOneItem=function removeOneItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ONE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};
